column5: Has anyone used the lowrance broadband radar for their boat? It's pretty pricey but would be great to have when away from camp on a big lake. I was also thinking that you could subscribe to local radar for your sonar/gps unit too? Does anyone know anything about this, and if it would cover nw ontario?
You might find these threads helpful. http://www.idofishing.com/forum/show.../186/fpart/allhttp://www.idofishing.com/forum/show...ance-3-g-radar
I probably should have been more specific. I'd be using this for weather radar.
